title: Application
description: A set of code, content, and data that together implement an experience

application_id.description:
A unique identifier given to every application.

The format is a [GUID-based URN](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4122.txt). The pattern to generate an ID is ```urn:acp:{system}:{id} - {format}:{namespace}:{system}:{id}```
